segments.text: You ’ re kidding . We ’ ll never make it across in one piece ! Let ’ s cross at the light .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Now we have to walk all the way down to the end of the street .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you want to cross here , be my guest . I don ’ t feel like dodging cars and scooters !
segments.speaker: S2
